Pre-Game Insights: The Memphis Grizzlies will square off with the Washington Wizards in NBA action at FedExForum on Saturday, beginning at 12:00pm AEDT.
With star players Jaren Jackson, Santi Aldama and Zach Edey, the Grizzlies are up against a Wizards line-up that includes Jordan Poole, Corey Kispert and Jonas Valanciunas.
Stats Insider's predictive analytics model currently gives the Grizzlies a 72% chance of beating the Wizards at FedExForum.
The Grizzlies are 7.5-point favourites against the Wizards, with odds of $1.91 available at Bet365.
According to Stats Insider's analytics model, the Wizards (+7.5) are predicted to cover the line 53% of the time, while the 231.5-point over/under is expected to stay under 52% of the time.
Stats Insider's predicted final score for Grizzlies vs Wizards at FedExForum on Saturday is the Grizzlies prevailing 118-112.
Jaren Jackson is expected to lead the Grizzlies with 31 points, 7 rebounds and 3 assists, while Jordan Poole is projected to finish with 19 points, 3 rebounds and 6 assists for the Wizards.
